name: Adam
text: "hapi hour is great! When I use this app it gives me a feeling in my soul like everything is going to be OK."

name: Tom
text: "I love it! If you think about it, the reason you are not currently using this app is because you think you are above it, which you are not. So pls use this in the slums with the rest of us."

name: Ria
text: "I love me a sweet deal. I live my life by the mantra of 'Go big, then go home'. I think this applies nicely to the philosophy of what hapihour are trying to acheive here."

name: Becki
text: "mmm dem sweet sweet deals. I come to hapihour for the deals and stay for the good times. Would reccommend to anyone looking to keep it real like John Peel."
